mapper.insert: insert into activity_special_right (activity_special_right_id, activity_id, order_amount, special_right_commodity_ids, special_right_remark) values (#{activity_special_right_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{special_right_commodity_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{special_right_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select activity_special_right_id, activity_id, order_amount, special_right_commodity_ids, special_right_remark from activity_special_right where activity_special_right_id = #{activity_special_right_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select activity_special_right_id, activity_id, order_amount, special_right_commodity_ids, special_right_remark from activity_special_right
